page.title: 17Listed buildings
page.content: There are many listed buildings in the area. Six are farm houses: Dovehills (once called Duffield), Upper and Lower Venn, Paunton Court,Munderfield Court, and Frome Manor. Paunton Court has many out buildings which are listed, also a mill house and cottages. Some of these are now being converted into holiday accommodation. Upper and Lower Venn have listed barns. Munderfield Court has a listed barn and hop kiln. Other listed buildings include several cottages in Munderfield Row, Stocks Cottage, Chestnut Cottage, and The Rhea.
